name: Mimic,Self & I
description:
Mimic,Self & I

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2020!

In this game the goal is to exit the prison by CONTROLLING the mimics that come OUT OF you. Use them precisely to escape room or things can go easily OUT OF CONTROL.

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D  to Move

W,A,D + Space to Spawn Mimic

R to reset level

Esc to Quit

This was my point of  this year's theme!

Also is my first time joining this jam!

Hope you like it! Any feedback is acceptable!
